name: AuroIN
overview:
Incorporated in 2001, AuroIN is a leader in digital marketing solutions blending technology and human ingenuity to help enterprise brands leverage customer intelligence to maximize their return on investment. AuroIN’s intent-based solutions – including search engine optimization, social media, conversion rate optimization, paid search, reputation management and digital analytics – create personalized experience driving measurable results, incremental revenue, and smarter marketing campaigns.

AuroIN’s core business model is to provide companies of all sizes with expertly managed online marketing campaigns, leveraging innovation, leadership, and a strong understanding of digital media. AuroIN’s delivery model relies on four parameters

  1. Creating better website visibility
  2. Generate more traffic from online media
  3. Enhancing better conversions
  4. Reducing cost of customer acquisitions

AuroIN team is made up of SEO thought leaders, social media strategists, usability and conversion rate experts and online brand managers who loves to help business grow. As said by it’s visionary founder Mr. Annada Prasad Padhy, “Internet is a great medium to build a connected brand that focuses on people rather than targets, creates an engagement and communicates with customers, which in turn builds trust that is both meaningful and long-lasting. We bring amalgamation of all the above at an incredibly cost effective way.”

AuroIN – Key Company Facts:

* 700 Employees * 1413 clients across the globe * Marketing offices in USA, Singapore & China * Global delivery center in India * BBB(Better Business Bureau) accredited business * NASSCOM member

The foundation of the AuroIN’s growth over the last 12 years is a deep understanding the stimuli for SEO basics, customer needs, and the ability to translate them into customer-desired offerings through leading edge research.

milestones.description: TopSEOs rates AuroIN #23, with overall score of 89.8%.
milestones.source_description: Best SEO Company in India - May 2013
